Listing 17.3: Example of a function for ﬁlling missing values.
We can apply this function directly to the data within the DataFrame.
# fill missing
fill_missing(dataset.values)
Listing 17.4: Example ﬁlling missing values.
Now we can create a new column that contains the remainder of the sub-metering, using the
calculation from the previous section.
# add a column for for the remainder of sub metering
values = dataset.values
